name: Trouble in Babble Temple
description:
You are a magicien, leading a group of adventurer through the Temple of Babble Baal. You can command your companions, but, beware! Some of them hate each other and put the mission at risk. More than this, the evil god Babble Baal is playing with your mind and swaps the words you say. Hopefully, thanks to your powerful magic, you know which words have been swapped. Command carefully, and you will be able to conquer the Temple!

Team:
